subject: John Zaffis coming to Kentucky in April !!!
author: Jim
full_text:
For those members that are close to Central Kentucky , John Zaffis is 
doing a Paranormal Seminar at the E.K.U campus in Richmond,Ky. For 
further details go to www.kentuckyshadowchasers.com and get the 
details. Hope to CYA there  :)
By the way I love EVP work and ITC work it does rule !!
